channel.title: git on Wangqian Ju's website
channel.description: Recent content in git on Wangqian Ju's website

item.title: R project first then git
item.description: The primary goal of this blog is to remind me how to link my local R project to a newly created git repo. The content are mainly from the chapter 17 of the book Happy Git and GitHub for the useR by Jennifer Bryan. Step 1 Get a local R project and its folder ready. Step 2 Create github repo Step 3 Connect the local R project folder to the remote github repo
